description:
Summary metrics about containers running on Kubernetes nodes.

Dashboard was taken from here.  This version does not reqiure you to
setup the Kubernetes-app plugin. (https://github.com/grafana/kubernetes-app)

Use this Helm chart to launch Grafana into a Kubernetes cluster.  It will include this dashboard and many more dashboards to give you visibility into the Kubernetes Cluster. (https://github.com/sekka1/cloud-public/tree/master/kubernetes/pods/grafana-helm)

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="cpu"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*"}) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="cpu"}) * 100

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="memory"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*"}) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="memory"}) * 100

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="cpu"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="cpu"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="memory"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="memory"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", resource="cpu"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster"})

panels.title: Sum of pod CPU requests in worker nodes
Sum of containers' CPU usage in worker nodes

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", resource="memory"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster"})

panels.title: Sum of pod memory requests in worker nodes
Sum of containers' memory usage in worker nodes
Namespaces with significant CPU request usage
Namespaces with significant memory request usage

targets.expr: sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster"} * on (pod, container, namespace) group_left(node) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster="$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", resource="cpu"} )

topk(50, sort_desc(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", resource="cpu"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster"}))

topk(50, sort_desc(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", resource="memory"} * on (pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_status_running{kubernetes_cluster=~"$Cluster"})) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)

title: SRE Kubernetes Cluster
